pages.text: TrinkPlus comes with a new set of materials called Ender Materials. Similar to the Glowing Materials, these items are used in several recipes.
Crafting the Ender Ingot$(br)If Nyx is installed, Fallen Stars can be used in place of Eyes of Ender
There are also miscellaneous materials which may be important depending on the recipe you are trying to craft.
The Chroma Shard is used to make the Lunar Crystal and Ascension Essence.
Ascension Essence is used to craft super trinkets.
Spicy Coal is used to create Solarborn related transformation items. It can also be used as a potent fuel, smelting one stack.
